1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, abintek. Chi el waw yuj yatakil chin oni. Cha ab in txaj.</t>
2: <t>A bay lajubal tx'otx' tx'otx' chi el waw ayach, tol chi el yip in c'ul chi wabej. I in ajtok yiban junok miman ch'en, cax chin colchaji.</t>
3: <t>Ach ayach oc in colbalbaok, axca junok ch'en miman is tel chin is col bay eb ajc'ul.</t>
4: <t>Chi yochej in c'ul chin ayji bay atut yin tojbalk'inal, chi wochej chin c'ubaj in ba en axca chi yun c'uban ba no yune ca·∫çlan yalan xic' is txutx.</t>
5: <t>Ach in Dios, max ab walben ayach, cax max ak'on in satak xol eb ay elapnok yul sat.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Ak' miman k'inalej ayin rey in ti', ayinokab ec' yin xiwilok abil,</t>
7: <t>cax chi wak'on yajawilal a satak. Taynej in yin a camc'ulalil yuj chi yunc'al tzet chala'.</t>
8: <t>Cayton tu' ok yun ach in bitnen yin tojbalk'inal, cax ok wiken walben ayach yin junjun c'u.</t>
